thread.title: Load DynamiX to Present Storage Performance Validation Solutions at Four November Events
thread.title_full: Load DynamiX to Present Storage Performance Validation Solutions at Four November Events

author: admin
title: Load DynamiX to Present Storage Performance Validation Solutions at Four November Events
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/21/2015 @ 9:00 AM   Load DynamiX 
SAN JOSE, Calif., Oct. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Load DynamiX , the leader in storage infrastructure performance validation , will be showcasing its award-winning Load DynamiX Enterprise platform at the following four events in November: 
November 3-4 : Storage Decisions - New York. On Wednesday, November 4, Len Rosenthal, vice president of worldwide marketing at Load DynamiX, will deliver a presentation: Software Defined Storage: will it work - at scale? They will be exhibiting at booth #9. 
November 10: EMC Forum - Dallas. Load DynamiX will be showcasing the Load DynamiX Enterprise platform. 
November 10-11: Cloud Expo Europe - Frankfurt, Germany. Load DynamiX will be exhibiting at booth 653, and Len Rosenthal, vice president of worldwide marketing for Load DynamiX, will present as part of a storage evolution panel discussion at 2:00pm on Tuesday, November 10. 
November 18 : EMC Federal Summit - Washington DC. Load DynamiX will be demonstrating why the Load DynamiX Enterprise platform is quickly becoming a solution of choice for rightsizing government storage deployments. 
Please note that presentation times may change. If you plan on attending any of the above, we recommend that you check the online conference schedule closer to the event. 
"We are looking forward to educating the attendees about how to make more informed decisions about storage deployments at next month's events," said Len Rosenthal, vice president of marketing for Load DynamiX. "Not only will we be demonstrating our award-winning storage performance validation solutions, but we will also share insights and examples on how Load DynamiX has helped Global 1000 enterprises better manage costs and ensure storage infrastructure performance through workload modeling and storage performance analytics." 
Media/analysts wishing to schedule a briefing with Load DynamiX at November events can contact Kelly Dorsey ( kdorsey@loaddynamix.com ). 
For the latest news and information, engage with Load DynamiX via: -- Homepage: www.loaddynamix.com -- Twitter: https://twitter.com/LoadDynamiX -- Blog: www.loaddynamix.com/blog -- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Load-DynamiX/287927074597112 -- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/221570?trk=tyah 
About Load DynamiX As the leader in storage infrastructure performance validation, Load DynamiX empowers storage professionals with the insight needed to make intelligent decisions regarding networked storage. By accurately characterizing and emulating real-world application behavior, Load DynamiX optimizes the overall performance, availability, and cost of storage infrastructure. The combination of advanced workload analytics and modeling software with extreme load-generating appliances give IT professionals the ability to cost-effectively validate and stress today's most complex physical, virtual and cloud infrastructure to its limits.
